author: cbs8
title: Global UPS Services Market 2015-2019 - Growing Number of Data Centers is a Key Market Driver
text:
Research and Markets
DUBLIN
Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/jr6b7x/global_ups ) has announced the addition of the "Global UPS Services Market 2015-2019" report to their offering.
Covered in this Report
The global UPS services market can be segmented into four divisions based on service type: contracts, installation, maintenance and repair, and others.
The report, Global UPS Services Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the market landscape and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report also includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market.
Recent technological advancements pertaining to the development of innovative UPS systems is a trend observed in this market. The technological advancements in UPS systems will enable users to overcome issues related to power outages. Quick charging technology enables fast recharging of batteries in areas prone to frequent power cuts.
According to the report, one driver that augments growth in this market is the growing number of data centers. An increase in data center applications is the major factor contributing to the growing use of UPS in the ITES segment. The rapid increase in consumer data consumption is driven by reliable and robust UPS systems used in the ITES industry.
